home.intro: I'm a developer passionate about creating innovative digital solutions that make a difference in people's lives.
home.readyDescription: I'm always interested in challenging opportunities and innovative projects. Let's talk about how I can help bring your ideas to life.
home.lastProjectDescription: An innovative plugin that allows controlling the mouse cursor through hand gestures using computer vision and machine learning.

stats.skillsDescription: Tools and technologies I use to create exceptional digital experiences

projects.projectsDescription: A collection of projects I've developed, from modern web applications to innovative solutions using artificial intelligence.
projects.collaborationDescription: I'm always interested in new challenges and collaboration opportunities. Let's work together to create something extraordinary.

gesturePlugin.title: Gesture Plugin
gesturePlugin.description: Innovative plugin that allows controlling the mouse cursor through hand gestures using computer vision and machine learning.

walletTracker.title: Personal Wallet Tracker
walletTracker.description: Personal investment management application, built with a family member.

cineWorld.title: CineWorld
cineWorld.description: Website containing information about movies in a MongoDB database and a chatbot that answers questions about movies with three types of questions, using the Gemini API.

silentWar.title: Silent War
silentWar.description: Silent War is a web application that allows authenticated users to participate in real-time auctions by submitting bids that are instantly reflected.

licenPlateRecognition.title: License Plate Recognition
licenPlateRecognition.description: Web application for license plate recognition using computer vision and machine learning (YOLO) and save in a excel file.

about.aboutDescription: A developer passionate about creating innovative digital solutions that make a difference. I combine creativity with technology to transform ideas into reality.
about.journeyDescription1: I started my programming journey during my Computer Engineering degree at Instituto Politécnico de Viana do Castelo, where I discovered my passion for creating innovative technological solutions.
about.journeyDescription2: Since then, I've specialized in full-stack development, with a special focus on modern technologies like React, Next.js and Python. Each project is an opportunity to learn something new and expand my horizons.
about.journeyDescription3: When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies and practicing physical activities like going to the gym.
about.instituteName: Instituto Politécnico de Viana do Castelo
about.valuesDescription: Principles that guide my work and approach to development
about.innovationDescription: Always looking for creative solutions and emerging technologies
about.precisionDescription: Focus on details and quality in every line of code
about.passionDescription: Genuine love for development and creating unique experiences
about.performanceDescription: Optimization and efficiency are fundamental in all projects

facts.sport: I have played football and karate

featured.lastProjectDescription: This project was developed during my Computer Engineering degree at Instituto Politécnico de Viana do Castelo. The goal was to develop a plugin where users could simulate their mouse through gestures, enabling clicking, scrolling, and much more.
featured.exploring: Exploring the latest technologies and innovations
